original_text: “Six days you shall do your work, but on the seventh day you shall rest; that your ox and your donkey may have rest, and the son of your servant woman, and the alien, may be refreshed.
korean_text: 너는 엿새 동안에 네 일을 하고 일곱째 날에는 쉬라 네 소와 나귀가 쉴 것이며 네 여종의 자식과 나그네가 숨을 돌리리라

sentences.original_text: Six days you shall do your work
but on the seventh day you shall rest
that your ox and your donkey may have rest
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너의 소와 나귀가 쉬게 하려 함이며

sentences.original_text: and the son of your servant woman
